original_text: They will throw dirt from the ground on their heads because they are so sad. They will weep and they will shout, ‘Bad trouble has come to you, Babylon! Great city! It is very bad for you! Everyone who had ships on the sea became rich because of you. You used your money to buy their expensive things. But in one single hour God has destroyed that city.’ They will throw dirt from the ground on their heads because they are so sad. They will weep and they will shout, ‘Bad trouble has come to you, Babylon! Great city! It is very bad for you! Everyone who had ships on the sea became rich because of you. You used your money to buy their expensive things. But in one single hour God has destroyed that city.’ They will throw dirt from the ground on their heads because they are so sad. They will weep and they will shout,
korean_text: 티끌을 자기 머리에 뿌리고 울며 애통하여 외쳐 이르되 화 있도다 화 있도다 이 큰 성이여 바다에서 배 부리는 모든 자들이 너의 보배로운 상품으로 치부하였더니 한 시간에 망하였도다

sentences.original_text: They will throw dirt from the ground on their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 땅의 흙을 자신들의 머리에 던질 것입니다

sentences.original_text: Bad trouble has come to you, Babylon!
It is very bad for you!
Everyone who had ships on the sea became rich
sentences.korean_translation: 바다에 배를 가진 모든 사람들이 부자가 되었습니다

sentences.original_text: You used your money to buy their expensive things
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 너의 돈을 사용하여 그들의 비싼 것들을 샀다
